tmpl_loop.name: infoxml
tmpl_loop.data:
<customerDTO>
<id><tmpl_var name="id"></id> <lastName1><tmpl_var name="lastName1"></lastName1> <lastName2><tmpl_var name="lastName2"></lastName2> <legalName><tmpl_var name="legalName"></legalName> <names><tmpl_var name="names"></names>
<tmpl_if name='defaultBillingAddress'><defaultBillingAddress><tmpl_var name="defaultBillingAddress"></defaultBillingAddress></tmpl_if> <tmpl_if name='defaultShippingAddress'><defaultShippingAddress><tmpl_var name="defaultShippingAddress"></defaultShippingAddress></tmpl_if>
<email><tmpl_var name="email"></email> <gender><tmpl_var name="gender"></gender> <birthDate><tmpl_var name="birthday"></birthDate> <salesPersonCode><tmpl_var name="salesPersonCode"></salesPersonCode> <tmpl_if name="addresses"> <tmpl_loop name="addresses"> <addresses> <addressName><tmpl_var name="addressName"></addressName> <address><tmpl_var name="address"></address> <cityCode><tmpl_var name="cityCode"></cityCode> <cityName><tmpl_var name="cityName"></cityName> <stateCode><tmpl_var name="stateCode"></stateCode> <stateName><tmpl_var name="stateName"></stateName> <email><tmpl_var name="email"></email> <addressType><tmpl_var name="addressType"></addressType> <mobile><tmpl_var name="mobile"></mobile> <phone><tmpl_var name="phone"></phone> </addresses> </tmpl_loop> </tmpl_if> </customerDTO>
